name: ekShop
description: ekShop is a fully open-source eCommerce platform that is customizable and configurable to your needs. It is completely free, adaptable and open to be supported by a worldwide community of volunteers and contributors. Itâ€™s free and open source nature allows users to maintain complete control of the data content and modify it as they wish and according to their needs. Our intended goal is to allow any potential entrepreneur to quickly get up and running with an online platform to sell goods online.

SDGs.evidenceText: ekShop is a scalable open-source eCommerce solution that provides the power of harnessing online marketplace and businesses into the hands of everyday folks. ekShop allows people to bring forth sustainable livelihoods by engaging entrepreneurs, merchants, and employees that help the business operate. As a result, ekShop, when implemented correctly, can uplift communities and populations out of poverty.

ekShop has strict policies for preventing all forms of gender discrimination by offering equal opportunity to every gender, race, and ethnicity to participate in its platform - both in the capacity of buyer and seller. Women, in particular, can find the means of selling their creations and handicrafts through the platform and gain reach, unlike other means before.

ekShop provides a new infrastructure hosted in the digital space and allows for developing sustainable business models in its platform. This fosters economic development for communities and populations as they engage in this new platform to conduct business and transact with finances.  As a result of this platform and the users it attracts, financial institutions are also brought forth to be made accessible to those who are participants of the platform, effectively increasing the scope of exposure for Financial Institutions to those who are needy and poor. ekShop's infrastructure depends on accessibility by the internet, and its creation and continued survival will ensure the development of internet connectivity in underdeveloped regions to expand its reach.

ekShop allows participants to use the platform without requiring any major upfront fees or expenses, unlike a traditional brick-and-mortar shop.  As a result, ekShop ensures that the lower class of economically successful population can easily take a role in this platform and significantly improve their chances of increasing their income growth potential.
